summary: The diff does not implement a new Terms & Conditions section. Instead, it only modifies `project_state.json` with unrelated feature metadata (REQ-1..REQ-5, etc.), which is not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Terms & Conditions section within the existing single-page layout, using the deep-link id "terms" (and without creating a separate Terms & Conditions page/route).
missing_requirements.reason: No application/UI/layout files were modified; the only change is to `project_state.json`, which does not add or render any Terms & Conditions section.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project state entries describing unrelated features (e.g., contact email replacement REQ-1, adding products REQ-2, product image handling REQ-3/REQ-4, About image updates REQ-5, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about adding a Terms & Conditions section and explicitly lists no requirements for these other features; the diff only reflects these unrelated feature descriptions.
